SCRIPT.MSCRI:
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.NORMALIZE_PATH :FILL &STRING_ARR#[] = STR_SPLIT(&UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING#, &SEPARATOR_CHAR#) :SET &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# = ""
:SET &VAR# = 1 :SET &LEN# = LENGTH(&STRING_ARR#[], SIZE)
:WHILE &VAR# LT &LEN# : IF &UC4RB_AGENT_OS# = "WINDOWS" : IF &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING#, "&SEPARATOR_CHAR#&STRING_ARR#[&VAR#]") : ELSE : SET &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# = &STRING_ARR#[&VAR#] : ENDIF : ELSE : SET &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING#, "&SEPARATOR_CHAR#&STRING_ARR#[&VAR#]") : ENDIF : SET &VAR# = &VAR# + 1 :ENDWHILE
